basics.name: Caroline Landelle
basics.summary:
Postdoctoral researcher working in Julien Doyon’s lab' at the Neuro, McGill University in Montréal.   
    I earned my PhD in neuroscience in 2019 at Aix-Marseille University under the Supervision of Anne Kavounoudias.   
    While during my PhD thesis I studied sensorimotor processes at the brain level, during my postdoc I extended my investigation toward the spinal cord level using spinal cord functional MRI.
